text: (born July 17, 1980) is a Japanese visual kei musician. He is a vocalist of the electro/dark wave duo Schwarz Stein. Kaya is also known for his feminine appearance and elegant dresses. His best known singles were "Kaleidoscope", "Masquerade" and "Chocolat". ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese musicians
title: Kaya (musician)
